```{r}
k1 <- function(t){
  return(t-.5)
}

k2 <- function(t){
  return( (k1(t)^2-1/12)/2 )
}

k4 <- function(t){
  return( (k1(t)^4-k1(t)^2/2+7/240)/24 )
}

K.sob <- function(s,t){
  ans <- 1 + k1(s)*k1(t) + k2(s)*k2(t) - k4(abs(s-t))
  return(ans)
}
```
```{r}

    kernelMatrix(rbf, data)
  } else if (type == 'sobolev') {
```
